exceptions.tactic: apply (filter110IsPR (fun a b => g a) H).
exceptions.exn: In environment g : nat -> nat H : isPR 1 g The term "H" has type "isPR 1 g" while it is expected to have type "isPR 2 (fun a _ : nat => g a)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall g : nat -> nat, isPR 1 g -> isPR 4 (fun a _ _ _ : nat => g a)

Premises:
isPR : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
filter100IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat, isPR 1 g -> isPR 3 (fun a _ _ : nat => g a)
filter10IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat, isPR 1 g -> isPR 2 (fun a _ : nat => g a)
filter0011IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 4 (fun _ _ c d : nat => g c d)
filter010IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat, isPR 1 g -> isPR 3 (fun _ b _ : nat => g b)
filter001IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat, isPR 1 g -> isPR 3 (fun _ _ c : nat => g c)
filter01IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat, isPR 1 g -> isPR 2 (fun _ b : nat => g b)
filter101IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 3 (fun a _ c : nat => g a c)
filter110IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 3 (fun a b _ : nat => g a b)
filter011IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 3 (fun _ b c : nat => g b c)
pi1_4IsPR = let H : 3 < 4 := le_n 4 in exist (fun p : PrimRec 4 => extEqual 4 (evalPrimRec 4 p) (fun a _ _ _ : nat => a)) (projFunc 4 3 H) (fun c _ _ _ : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 4 (fun a _ _ _ : nat => a)
pi3_4IsPR = let H : 1 < 4 := le_S 2 3 (le_S 2 2 (le_n 2)) in exist (fun p : PrimRec 4 => extEqual 4 (evalPrimRec 4 p) (fun _ _ c _ : nat => c)) (projFunc 4 1 H) (fun _ _ c1 _ : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 4 (fun _ _ c _ : nat => c)
pi4_4IsPR = let H : 0 < 4 := le_S 1 3 (le_S 1 2 (le_S 1 1 (le_n 1))) in exist (fun p : PrimRec 4 => extEqual 4 (evalPrimRec 4 p) (fun _ _ _ d : nat => d)) (projFunc 4 0 H) (fun _ _ _ c2 : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 4 (fun _ _ _ d : nat => d)
pi2_4IsPR = let H : 2 < 4 := le_S 3 3 (le_n 3) in exist (fun p : PrimRec 4 => extEqual 4 (evalPrimRec 4 p) (fun _ b _ _ : nat => b)) (projFunc 4 2 H) (fun _ c0 _ _ : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 4 (fun _ b _ _ : nat => b)
const1_NIsPR : forall n : nat, isPR 1 (fun _ : nat => n)
pi1_3IsPR = let H : 2 < 3 := le_n 3 in exist (fun p : PrimRec 3 => extEqual 3 (evalPrimRec 3 p) (fun a _ _ : nat => a)) (projFunc 3 2 H) (fun c _ _ : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 3 (fun a _ _ : nat => a)
pi1_2IsPR = let H : 1 < 2 := le_n 2 in exist (fun p : PrimRec 2 => extEqual 2 (evalPrimRec 2 p) (fun a _ : nat => a)) (projFunc 2 1 H) (fun c _ : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 2 (fun a _ : nat => a)
Init.Nat.shiftr = fun a : (fun _ : nat => nat) 0 => nat_rect (fun _ : nat => nat) a (fun _ : nat => Init.Nat.div2) : (fun _ : nat => nat) 0 -> forall n : nat, (fun _ : nat => nat) n Arguments Init.Nat.shiftr (_ _)%nat_scope
pi2_3IsPR = let H : 1 < 3 := le_S 2 2 (le_n 2) in exist (fun p : PrimRec 3 => extEqual 3 (evalPrimRec 3 p) (fun _ b _ : nat => b)) (projFunc 3 1 H) (fun _ c0 _ : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 3 (fun _ b _ : nat => b)
pi3_3IsPR = let H : 0 < 3 := le_S 1 2 (le_S 1 1 (le_n 1)) in exist (fun p : PrimRec 3 => extEqual 3 (evalPrimRec 3 p) (fun _ _ c : nat => c)) (projFunc 3 0 H) (fun _ _ c1 : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 3 (fun _ _ c : nat => c)
pi2_2IsPR = let H : 0 < 2 := le_S 1 1 (le_n 1) in exist (fun p : PrimRec 2 => extEqual 2 (evalPrimRec 2 p) (fun _ b : nat => b)) (projFunc 2 0 H) (fun _ c0 : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 2 (fun _ b : nat => b)
Nat.Bezout = fun n m p : nat => exists a b : nat, a * n = p + b * m : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.Bezout (_ _ _)%nat_scope
Nat.log2_up = fun a : nat => match 1 ?= a with | Lt => S (Nat.log2 (Nat.pred a)) | _ => 0 end : nat -> nat Arguments Nat.log2_up _%nat_scope
PrimRec_sind : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> SProp, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_rec : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Set, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_ind : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Prop, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_rect : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Type, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_PrimRecs_ind : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Prop) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Prop), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_PrimRecs_rec : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Set) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Set), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRecs_PrimRec_rec : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Set) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Set), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n n0 : nat) (p : PrimRecs n n0), P0 n n0 p
PrimRecs_PrimRec_ind : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Prop) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Prop), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n n0 : nat) (p : PrimRecs n n0), P0 n n0 p
Inductive ascii : Set := Ascii : bool -> bool -> bool -> bool -> bool -> bool -> bool -> bool -> Ascii.ascii Arguments Ascii.Ascii (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%bool_scope
Nat.sqrt_up = fun a : nat => match 0 ?= a with | Lt => S (Nat.sqrt (Nat.pred a)) | _ => 0 end : nat -> nat Arguments Nat.sqrt_up _%nat_scope
idIsPR = let H : 0 < 1 := le_n 1 in exist (fun p : PrimRec 1 => extEqual 1 (evalPrimRec 1 p) (fun x : nat => x)) (projFunc 1 0 H) (fun c : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 1 (fun x : nat => x)
succIsPR = exist (fun p : PrimRec 1 => extEqual 1 (evalPrimRec 1 p) S) succFunc (fun c : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 1 S
Init.Nat.log2_iter = fix log2_iter (k p q r : nat) {struct k} : nat := match k with | 0 => p | S k' => match r with | 0 => log2_iter k' (S p) (S q) q | S r' => log2_iter k' p (S q) r' end end : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.log2_iter (_ _ _ _)%nat_scope
Ascii.ascii_of_nat = fun a : nat => Ascii.ascii_of_N (BinNat.N.of_nat a) : nat -> Ascii.ascii Arguments Ascii.ascii_of_nat _%nat_scope
Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : VectorDef.t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n) Arguments VectorDef.t _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.nil _%type_scope Arguments VectorDef.cons _%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
Inductive sumbool (A B : Prop) : Set := left : A -> {A} + {B} | right : B -> {A} + {B} Arguments sumbool (_ _)%type_scope Arguments left {A B}%type_scope, [A] _ _ Arguments right {A B}%type_scope, _ [B] _
Ascii.nat_of_ascii = fun a : Ascii.ascii => BinNat.N.to_nat (Ascii.N_of_ascii a) : Ascii.ascii -> nat Arguments Ascii.nat_of_ascii _%char_scope
BinNatDef.N.div_eucl = fun a b : BinNums.N => match a with | BinNums.N0 => (BinNums.N0, BinNums.N0) | BinNums.Npos na => match b with | BinNums.N0 => (BinNums.N0, a) | BinNums.Npos _ => BinNatDef.N.pos_div_eucl na b end end : BinNums.N -> BinNums.N -> BinNums.N * BinNums.N Arguments BinNatDef.N.div_eucl (_ _)%N_scope

intros g H.
exact (filter110IsPR (fun a b => g a) H).
Qed.```
